tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text VARCHAR,
    suggestion_text VARCHAR,
    rating INT
);
Agents(id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255))
Feedback(id INT PRIMARY KEY, agent_id INT, feedback_text TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
Agents (agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY, agent_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, agent_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, agent_department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
Customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, customer_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, customer_phone VARCHAR(15))
Feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT NOT NULL, agent_id INT NOT NULL, feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL, feedback_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
Suggestions (suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT NOT NULL, suggestion_text TEXT NOT NULL, suggestion_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

Agents table
agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
agent_name TEXT NOT NULL,
agent_email TEXT NOT NULL

Feedback table
feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id INT NOT NULL,
feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
feedback_date DATE NOT NULL

Suggestions table
suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id INT NOT NULL,
suggestion_text TEXT NOT NULL,
suggestion_date DATE NOT NULL

Customers table
customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
customer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
customer_email TEXT NOT NULL

groups table
group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
group_name TEXT NOT NULL
